name: Inertie
description:
Hi, if you've found your way here, maybe you wish to see this little piece of test.

I by no mean intend to show anything special, this "game" was made as an exercise in the very beginning of my courses of game programming.

I just started 2 days ago, so ... well ... here is where i am !

All assets have been done by me, in a very quick rush, and i am not an artist, so be warned ( especially your ears ).

Lastly, i hope i managed to explain correctly my thoughts, because i am not very skilled in English either, but you've certainly notice ( and the really impressive scenario in game is written in French though ).

Have fun !
